website_summaries.verdict: Day hikers who seek a hiking boot offering a sneaker-like kind of comfort might want to try out the OUTline Mid GTX. Its superb performance on the trail can be attributed to its sticky outsole, supportiveness, and low weight. What it failed to achieve, though, is an accurate fit. Nevertheless, despite its width issue, the Salomon OUTline Mid GTX remains a likable gear.
pros: A majority of consumers stated that the Salomon OUTline Mid GTX was comfy right out of the box
Its ability to stick to various ground surfaces was recognized by numerous wearers
Experts commended the gear’s exemplary support system
According to several users, the lightness of this day hiking boot was exhilarating
One even mentioned he felt like he was wearing a sneaker
Plenty of hikers testified to the comfortable feel of this footgear
The OUTline Mid GTX from Salomon breathed well, based on a portion of customer reviews
cons: The narrow fit of this Salomon hiking boot did not please an online buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great except for tongue
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome, except for the loosey goosey tongue which, even though has extra material that makes it tough to lay down correctly on your foot, wasn't wide enough to tuck in between your foot and the sides of the boot as you tie them up. Otherwise a great boot that feels good right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Working man

customer_reviews.title: almost like wearing a sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Fit is somewhat small, but the shoe stretched a little with wear. Very light, almost like wearing a sneaker. Very good support. Unlike some hikers, fast and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: rcdancer

customer_reviews.title: a little narrow and I have a narrow foot
customer_reviews.text: good quality, comfortable, I went one size up but did not go wider. If you have a wide foot definitely choose wide and possible a half size up..
customer_reviews.author: LaneyB

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 pairs
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought a pair of Salomon Women's Outline Mid GTX W boots after she saw our son in law recommended them on his Journey More youtube site where he offers advice on hiking. After I saw her boots I decided to get a pair of Salomon Men's Outline Mid GTX Hiking Shoes. The boots are light weight and allowed air to keep the feel cool. They offer great ankle and arch support which is important to me at age 56. My wife and I now walk for hours and enjoy the outdoors. I recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Light and tight
customer_reviews.text: Full review to follow since I’ve not had them on the trail yet, but out of the box they are great. Fit is slightly small, but with some break in I think they will fit great. Very light feel overall. Nice look to them. Definitely hiking boots, but not too clunky looking. Like a substantial running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: M. Roomack

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate advertised color/the color is actually heckin good
customer_reviews.text: The color is much more dark than the photos suggest. I’m a long-time Salomon buyer and I am happy with these. My right foot is bigger than the left but the two boots fit great. As a warning see my pix- the beluga/caper/etc is a LOT darker in person. Tbh I love it more than the advertised color. Just bear in mind it will be darker but it looks quite good.
customer_reviews.author: Horse

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: Great boot/sneakers. Looks like hiking boot but some what made and wears like a sneaker. I love mine wear them daily. But if you have fat/wide feet they want be good for you. I have narrow feet and would not want them to be any tighter. I read this in the comments before I bought, it’s true. I also like the thin upper Part of the boot around your ankle. Water proof also. I’ll be getting another pair at some point had these about 1 yr
customer_reviews.author: A Vassey

customer_reviews.title: LOOOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutley love these! So light weight! I usually wear a mens 9.5 in solomons but I ordered a mens 10 in these as I tried a 9.5 on in a store and they were tight. They are narrow but with a half size up, they fit just right. Breathable and I believe to be waterproof so far. They have good grip on snow and ice and arent clunky. I could walk for days in these bad boys.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great little shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Salomon outline mid gtx is a comfortable light duty trail shoe. Runs a slightly narrow which I like, having narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great boot but arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about this purchase when I placed the order...until it arrived. I've been an avid Salomon fan for the last five years. The last Salomon boots lasted me about 3 years and loved everything about them. The MidGTX had a great read as an active hiker. They were extremely light-weight, breathable and provided great arch-support for flat footed people. They arrived, and had rips and tears in the tongue of the boot. Stitching also seemed lazy throughout the rest of the boot with "frilly" ends. This was very upsetting after spending $150 on a product and ultimately receiving a lemon. I Love your products Salomon, but the quality was rough on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't done much hiking with these yet, but after a few 2-3 mile walks they aren't as comfortable as I expected. I have been wearing Merrell shoes for years and thought I would give Salomon a try. On the other hand, my wife got the Ultra GTX and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Cason

customer_reviews.title: Awesome feel but may leak.
customer_reviews.text: I did what others suggested and ordered a half size up due to the narrowness of the bit. They seem to fit pretty well and are very comfortable. My first pair I did return because one of the shoes was letting water in somewhere just from walking in light rain and wet grass. I’ll have to see how this next pair turn out. But again, very comfortable and sneaker like.
customer_reviews.author: Bi2thelly

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Most shoes/boots hurt my feet after a couple hours, I tried thes for a couple miles on pavement the on dirt, no pain. They felt pretty good out of the box and real good after a couple hours. I went a half size large to allow for socks, perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Christie

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable, and light
customer_reviews.text: I'm wearing these boots/shoes... yes shoes they feel like I'm wearing shoes!!! In addition, I'm wearing all day to get a feel for it. I'm looking forward to my new job and using a pair of boots that will take care of my feet. ill update this post for future progress.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: super light shoes for mid cuts. The soles are slightly more thorn resistant than other brands. Bought 2 pairs and will buy them again, if they keep making them
customer_reviews.author: Cy

customer_reviews.title: No support
customer_reviews.text: These boots are super light. But they offer no ankle or arch support what so ever. They also claim to be water proof and that is just not true. The first time i went hiking in these boots they soaked right through in the first 15 min. Also be aware at how thin the material is, if your foot slips off a rock and into a dead small tree stump it will poke right through and impail the side of your foot or ankle. I am very disapointed in these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Renita P.

customer_reviews.title: Love them from day 1
customer_reviews.text: The photos don’t do justice to these shoes. They are darker than it appears on the photos. They fit comfortably and look amazing. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slippery on wet rocks and concrete.
customer_reviews.text: Find these boots to be very comfortable and great for hiking in the PNW. My issue is that the soles are VERY slippery on wet rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Noll

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoe, But Get a 1/2 Size Bigger
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes I've ever worn. You have to get a half size bigger. Even after reading all the reviews saying to get a half size bigger, I thought, "Not my feet...I'll just get my regular size (10.5)". I had to send them back for 11s and the 11s fit too perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Warner

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking boot, just too narrow for normal feet
customer_reviews.text: Have a standard size 11 foot. Ordered an 11.5 and it was too narrow to wear. Got a nice pair of Keens instead.
customer_reviews.author: B. Corum

customer_reviews.title: Salomon is the way to go! Very good shoe.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I work in law enforcement and on my feet a lot, this product is lightweight, waterproof, and very versatile. I highly recommend this product to my brothers in blue, especially for undercover work.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Military boots
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always worn Solomon’s for military work. These fit great and feel so comfortable. I have been worried about durability compared to the assaults, but I’ve been putting these to the dirt for hiking and climbing for months and still in near perfect shape!
customer_reviews.author: Jakob Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boots, but they are “water resistant” more than “water proof”
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice boot, worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, waterproof, good traction. Very nice boot, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Unsatisfactory

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Did a two day hike up and down moutains was comfortable the whole time
customer_reviews.author: randy edwards

customer_reviews.title: Semperfi.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I wore them in the military. Whole team did. Great.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney W Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe
customer_reviews.text: We used them on a hike and they where unbelievable / out of the box no sore feet! Awesome shoe, buy them
customer_reviews.author: berg adam

customer_reviews.title: Great boot and durable quality!
customer_reviews.text: Not as cushioned as expected, but overall a great boot!
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalo Escobedo

customer_reviews.title: Fits narrow and short
customer_reviews.text: Good quality overall, though fits narrow regardless I have narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: Irakli I.

customer_reviews.title: defective product
customer_reviews.text: Defective product was seen after first use. The defect is clearly seen on photo.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno M Burger

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight waterproof boot. It is a bit narrow near the arch but that's to be expected from Salomon.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Dahler

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time as stated, but I am unable to provide a true quality of these boots and its value. I have only had them for 2 days. I need to take them out on a few long distance walk to see how it performs to the rigorous pace I am going to put them through. So ask me again in Five months.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight, very comfortable. Glad I bought half a size bigger as they fit with thin socks, although normal for Salomon.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Great price and service, slightly small in the sizing and have worn out on both boots on the top were the fabric folds leaving an exposed bit of liner. Comfy though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are awesome. Very comfortable and stable. Going to NZ soon and that's exactly what I needed. Very light as well.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I bought. Half size larger and they are still tight. They are light and have great traction. Feel like a shoe more than bool. I wish it had 2 tie points for the ankle instead of 1. Not a lot of ankle support and that’s why I buy mid height.. after 15 miles or so of hiking, they loosened up a little.. but they are tight still .. if you are out and about doing fire roads.. they are great... if you are looking to do some more adventurous hikes, need real ankle support or need some stiffness for the soul of the shoe.. buy elsewhere.. these are high tops 5hat run tight and don’t secure the ankle
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Extremely uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: they look great! but after a few walks around the neighborhood my feet hurt. The bottom is rock hard, no give or flex. The boot itself is extremely uncomfortable. I felt like I was walking on the inside of the boot. If I put my knees together and spread my feet out, they fit fine. I hoped breaking them in would correct this. it didnt.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits a little snug on my medium/no arch size 12 feet. (I added SOLE cork inserts) But they just needed to be broken in. Great look for street or office. My wallet is still crying though
customer_reviews.author: Floridian

customer_reviews.title: light, sturdy and good looking
customer_reviews.text: I just got them today. They are very light yet sturdy. Very stable, nice traction. they feel snuggle but it like that. They look awesome. I think of using them for more than hiking
customer_reviews.author: Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 10. Way too narrow for a 10. The shoes look great if you can find a size that fits. I might return for an 11. I think the sizing is close but the shoes just run extremely narrow. If you have a wider foot I would recommend sizing up to try these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First pair of Solomon hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: I like the boots. Lightweight like a tennis shoe but way better. Good traction, stability, have not yet been in the mud/water but seem to be waterproof as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Anderson

customer_reviews.title: SOLE SEARCHING
customer_reviews.text: Fit good and felt good . The waffle soled cleats on the balls of my feet worn smooth in no time . This is from walking 5 miles 4 times a week . I have had them 3 months and they are about to wear completely through . Maybe your only supposed to walk in soft grass or dirt with these and not gravel or concrete . Anyway I would buy again if the sole were more durable .
customer_reviews.author: James Cox

product_meta.title: SALOMON Men's Shoes Outline Mid GTX Bk/Beluga/Capers Mountain
product_meta.description: SALOMON OUTLINE MID GTX [BLACK BELUGA CAPERS]A fashionable outdoor shoe, the Salomon OUTline MID GTX comes dressed in a clean colour scheme. It is flexible and lightweight as a running shoe but provides enough grip and waterproof protection for any trail. A Gore-Tex construction offers optimal breathability and keeps feet dry and comfortable. textile / synthetic upper textile lining synthetic sole High Traction Contagrip OrthoLite insole protective heel cap protective toe cap gusseted tongue Gore-Tex quick-drying lining
feature_bullets: Contagrip MD is focused on long-term wear. Using the most durable compound, it has a lug pattern that works equally well on both hard and smooth or soft and loose surfaces.
GORE-TEX keeps your feet dry -from the outside as well as from the inside.
